statements: SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM product;
SELECT category_name, product_name FROM product INNER JOIN product_category ON product.category_id = product_category.category_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM product_category WHERE category_name LIKE 'F%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id FROM product;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, pc.category_name FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.category_id = pc.category_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_amount FROM sales GROUP BY sale_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT pc.category_name, COUNT(p.product_id) AS total_products FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.category_id = pc.category_id GROUP BY pc.category_name HAVING total_products > 5 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM category;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM category ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM category WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product WHERE category_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM product JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id WHERE product.product_id = 1;
SELECT product.product_name, category.category_name FROM product JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id WHERE category.category_id = 1 ORDER BY product.product_name DESC;

SELECT category.category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id GROUP BY category.category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_products DESC;

SELECT product.product_name, category.category_name FROM product JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id WHERE product.product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY category.category_name, product.product_name;

SELECT category.category_name, MAX(product.product_id) AS max_product_id FROM product JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id GROUP BY category.category_name HAVING MAX(product.product_id) > 5 ORDER BY max_product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM category WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, category_id, amount FROM sales WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT max(amount) AS max_amount FROM sales;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM product JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id;
SELECT product_name, category_id, amount FROM product JOIN sales ON product.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name, SUM(amount) AS total_sales FROM category JOIN sales ON category.category_id = sales.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT category_id, SUM(total_sales) FROM sales_report GROUP BY category_id;
SELECT * FROM category ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product.name, sales.quantity FROM product JOIN sales ON product.id = sales.product_id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT category.name AS category_name, SUM(total_sales) AS total_category_sales FROM sales_report JOIN category ON sales_report.category_id = category.id GROUP BY category_id;
SELECT * FROM category;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sale ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, sale_date FROM sale WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customer_sale JOIN customer ON customer_sale.customer_id = customer.customer_id JOIN sale ON customer_sale.sale_id = sale.sale_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM product JOIN sale ON product.product_id = sale.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 100;

SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM customer JOIN customer_sale ON customer.customer_id = customer_sale.customer_id JOIN sale ON customer_sale.sale_id = sale.sale_id WHERE sale.sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT category_name, product_name, sale_amount FROM category JOIN product ON category.category_id = product.category_id JOIN sale ON product.product_id = sale.product_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_amount FROM sale;
